website_summaries.verdict: This stunning high-end bistro set is practical, yet comfortable, and built to stand the test of time.
pros: The 2 chairs both swivel and rock
The large seat cushions are highly comfortable
Cushions are stain-resistant and UV-protected for outdoor use
The 32-inch diameter of the table is large enough for al fresco dining

customer_reviews.title: Seemed like they were packaged very well
customer_reviews.text: Very nice chairs. Seemed like they were packaged very well. I ordered 2 sets of these. One set is perfect the other set had some gouges on the front of the back rest which was disappointing, but I guess not really worth going through a replacement. Other than that they are very sturdy and comfortable. Seem very well made and the cushions are especially nice and well made. They look like true linen.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced junk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set 7 months ago, in September 2014. I live in the northeast and got a LOT of snow this winter. I guess this table couldn't stand up to the weight of it, because I went out to my porch for the first time since the snow melted this spring to discover that two of the legs of the table had bent backwards and snapped off (in the same spot on both legs). Since the legs broke off, I'm able to see that the inside is hollow and the metal portion is quite thin (see photo). In summary, I paid $550 and got one season out of it. I'd advise that you avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dav

customer_reviews.title: Good quality with a good price tag.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this table and chairs set. I've had them for a couple months to put on my balcony and have no issues with them. It was easy to put together and they seem to be very sturdy and durable and I think they will last a long time. I especially like how there are these screws on the bottom of each leg to easily adjust the table so it balances properly. They came with brown cushions that felt nice but I found to be really plain so I ordered more colorful cushions to replace them. I'd recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Want to ruin your day?  Buy this item.
customer_reviews.text: Worst item I have ordered in years. If you have ordered one when it shows up handed back to the driver and ask him/her to return it to Amazon. None of the legs on the table come close to lining up. Even when you attach them individually the bolts don’t hold the legs tightly. If you order one of these and don’t return it don’t say I didn’t warn you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and simple assembly
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, seems sturdy and is easy to assemble. I'm not too handy, but took me less than 90 minutes to unbox and put together. Each chair is 4 bolts, washers and nuts. The table is 12 screws. The instructions are good, just follow them and you should be in good shape. I really like the chairs that rock and swivel.
customer_reviews.author: Peter M. Rudnicky

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, but missing parts for assembly
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality set, but second set I've bought from the manufacturer and each time some of the bolts for assembly were missing-the blister packs were broken in transit and some of the bolts, nuts or washers were missing. The chairs and tables are nice quality and the cushions are fair quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Fox

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on my deck
customer_reviews.text: This set is a really wonderful addition to my deck. The table and chairs look great and the chairs are very comfortable. The rocking feature is very nice and relaxing. Assembly is relatively easy, however I did have to enlarge one of the predrilled holes - but with plenty of power tools around, it wasn't too much of a hassle, especially considering the price I paid. I would definitely buy this set again, and am actually thinking of getting two more of the chairs to have a set of four.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Leichardt

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This is a resort quality set. The castings are solid, and while light enough to move with ease, but heavy enough to take some wind. The finish is better than the box store stuff, and the swivel recliners are made from easily reproducible parts for when things do wear out. It may cost a bit more than other sets, but if you are looking for a set that will last and can be serviced over the long haul, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Powell

customer_reviews.title: Chairs provide the perfect support and they rock and swivel! Best investment ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! It’s easy to assemble and very easy to move around. We originally ordered it for the two chairs to make our family table have eight seats. We ended up placing it near our poolside and just bring the two chairs over when the family gathers!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Has held up beautifully.
customer_reviews.text: This set is about to go through it’s second winter. It looks like the day it came in. Beautiful set. Lives in our patio in the Texas outdoor weather.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene Mccord

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: This set has adorned my deck all spring and summer. Threw a couple red pillows on 'em, an ivy in a red pot and my red rocker + other cutie things and my deck is just adorable!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ozark Farm Chick

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: The set is nice and easy to assemble. However, it arrived damaged and looks like its been painted over, scraped.
customer_reviews.author: Danuta Ehlenberger

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy yet not overly heavy table and chairs
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this set for our son's home. It arrived on time and was fairly easy to put together. The table and chairs are sturdy but not as heavy as we'd feared they would be. We enjoy drinking our morning tea and coffee while sitting at the table. The chairs swivel and rock, making them even more comfortable. This was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jeniferj

customer_reviews.title: beautifully crafted set
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, beautifully crafted set. Had to have assistance to assemble the chairs, but got them rockin' and swiveling. Can change out cushions to seasonal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Quality of the set  is superb but cushions are disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: The chairs themselves are very comfortable however very disappointed in the quality of the cushions. We both are of average weight but can feel the bar underneath when we sit down. For the price of this set I expected better quality cushions. Otherwise we are happy with the set.
customer_reviews.author: earl merryman

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect size for the space on our porch
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for the space on our porch. Its a little on the light weight size but we don't mind. Only time will tell about the durability . Otherwise I highly recommend it, it looks and feels comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Casciocrew

customer_reviews.title: This looks great on my patio
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted and expected. Item was delivered right on time and took about 30 minutes to assemble the two swivel rockers and table. This looks great on my patio, and I look forward to using it often.
customer_reviews.author: Montie

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Found a similar set at a big box store for $849 - happy to find as ornate a set for less. It is more difficult to assemble than described. Mine was scratched - which I don't like, but it has a touch up kit. Cushions were missing and to be replace by manufacturer. Nice weight, heavy, but not wrought-iron heavy.
customer_reviews.author: iThinkYou'reFunny

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color on the cushions-very easy to assembly
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color on the cushions-very easy to assembly. We are very happy with this purchase -the chairs are comfortable the turn and rocket with ease. The table is beautiful. The material is sturdy and much lighter than expected. Easier to move around than our heavy cast iron set.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this patio set. Very comfortable and great looking. Sturdy and easy to assemble. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great! These came in as scheduled but one piece ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! These came in as scheduled but one piece was broken on the back of one of the chairs. I was having a party by the pool and I needed the additional seating so I haven't mentioned it to the seller. I think I can probably glue it back together. Overall, very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice compliment to the 8 person table
customer_reviews.text: Very nice compliment to the 8 person table. Still has the channels at bottom of base that collects water after a rain.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Walker

customer_reviews.title: Looks great very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Received within a week of order. My grandson put together for me. I like that it is heavy and won’t tip over easily.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara E Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product table is much larger tha it looks in the picture
customer_reviews.author: L. D. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This set was so nice, I have my morning coffee there every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Ann

customer_reviews.title: Seat Cushions
customer_reviews.text: I love the bronze bistro. I am very disappointed with the seat cushions. They are not a good quality. They are flimzy and too flat. No support..
customer_reviews.author: Grace Shirley

customer_reviews.title: FITS THE BILL
customer_reviews.text: NICE LITTLE SET. I GET LOTS OF POSITIVE COMMENTS ABOUT IT. SEAT IS COMFORTABLE.
customer_reviews.author: keaise

customer_reviews.title: chairs fine table defective
customer_reviews.text: The chairs are fine but the table has a defect and can not be assembled
customer_reviews.author: intensive personality

customer_reviews.title: would like to receive table
customer_reviews.text: Missing entire table, would like to receive table now. Received table, everything seems in good shape!
customer_reviews.author: Ramona J Modica

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, made very well but cushions are not the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice,made very well but cushions are not the best...still worth every penny:)
customer_reviews.author: Tina Berry

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice rockers and table for our outside "coffee" area. Very simple to assemble as well. Resort quality. Much nicer than the large box store designs.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I wanted and fit the space perfectly. Easy to put together and beautiful. Thanks, Carol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SQUEAK
customer_reviews.text: no matter what i do the chairs make a lot of noise squeak
customer_reviews.author: Y

customer_reviews.title: Missing hardware
customer_reviews.text: The table didn’t come with any hardware to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon P Spencer

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Delivery was perfect Assembly the best
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Delivery was perfect Assembly the best. Quality is perfect. I hope to enjoy it for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: T. F. Lopez Calleja

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great Set, also purchased the 4 chair larger table set too.
customer_reviews.author: Jwesty

customer_reviews.title: Solid Construction, Straightforward Assembly.
customer_reviews.text: No suprises, this is as good as it looks in the photographs. Fairly straightforward assembly. Each chair has 4 bolts to attach the top to the base which are a bit tricky to align but doesn't take long. Smooth motion and squeak free. The cushions are sturdy. The table has 12 easy bolts and comes together quickly as well. There are feet at the bottom that can be adjusted for uneven surfaces. I'd like the chairs to be a couple of inches higher but this is just preference.
customer_reviews.author: Random Feature

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Received on time and is exactly what I was looking for for a 10 x 10 patio. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: AUNT

customer_reviews.title: a socket set and a good quality hex wrench is required
customer_reviews.text: this product can not be put together with the tools that are provided. a socket set and a good quality hex wrench is required. this is necessary because the pre-drilled holes are not precise and some screws will require considerable torque to overcome the flaws. the plastic caps to cover the screwheads does not project quality. table top and the chairs seems to be good quality but this is limited to a brief period of observation. these are decent table and chairs but this is not high quality furniture. that will probable cost much more.
customer_reviews.author: henry

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for the area I was wanting it for.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Gilman

customer_reviews.title: it is really nice.
customer_reviews.text: The order was messed up. Four standard chairs came in the package, instead of the two rocker, swivel chairs. Otherwise, it is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: William Cates

customer_reviews.title: Nice set for the price
customer_reviews.text: Finish is better than I expected. One of the table legs seems a little warped, but it sits fine. Overall I am happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Gary G

product_meta.title: Hanover TRADITIONS3PCSW Traditions 3-Piece Aluminum Rust-Free Patio Bistro Set Outdoor Furniture, Size 1, Tan
product_meta.description: Color:TanThe Hanover TRADITIONS3PCSW 3-piece Bistro Dining Set helps transform any backyard into an elegant dining area. Two cushioned swivel chairs and one 32 in. round table are included in this set. Both the chairs and table have cast-aluminum frames featuring heavy gauge extrusions with uniquely supported inner walls. The cushions are built to last with a high grade of 100% polyester wrapped around polyurethane foam, ensuring deep comfort while maintaining its original full shape. The olefin fabric is specifically designed, woven, and treated to be quick drying while resisting stains and UV harm. This space-saving set is perfect for smaller patios and pool areas. Minor assembly is required.
feature_bullets: Set includes: two outdoor swivel chairs and a round table
Heavy duty rust-resistant Frames: durable all-weather construction with rust-resistant aluminum frames
Generous cushion size: 2. 5" Uv protected cushions offer maximum comfort.Weight Capacity (Max):250 lbs
360 Degree spin swivel rockers: these rockers perform a Smooth, 360-degree spin and gentle Rocking motion while you enjoy your meal

CUSTOMER SERVICE : Hanover Customer Service is here to help!  If you are in need of replacement parts, parts due to damage in transit, or have any questions, please feel free to contact us and our customer service team will respond within 24 hours to assist you.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars68 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
